title: Employee Attrition Prediction Model
description: Predict employee turnover risk using HR data.
summary: This project predicts whether employees are likely to leave the company using HR analytics data. The model helps organizations understand attrition drivers and improve employee retention strategies.
dataset: IBM HR Analytics Employee Attrition Dataset
findings: Employees with low job satisfaction are more likely to leave.
Work-life balance has a moderate impact on attrition.
Monthly income strongly correlates with retention.

title: Credit Card Anomaly Detection
description: Detects potential fraudulent transactions using Isolation Forest.
summary: This project identifies suspicious credit card transactions using an Isolation Forest model. It focuses on anomaly detection in highly imbalanced datasets, where fraudulent transactions are extremely rare compared to legitimate ones.
findings: The model achieved a ROC-AUC of 0.98 and 86% recall on fraud detection.
Isolation Forest efficiently separates anomalies from normal transactions.
